application.name: iContact
application.description:
iContact
iContact is an all-inclusive finger-friendly contact manager for Windows Mobile PocketPC phones. It's easily skinnable, intuitive, and replaces the standard Windows Mobile contact chooser.
Check http://www.supware.net/iContact for more info!
Release Notes:
0.93 - April 16, 2009
Sped up recents list load time by 60 TIMES!
Added error message for missing skin
Added "gravity" setting to registry (accepts values from -100 to 100)
Fixed screen flicker on long press (thanks l3v5y!)
Gave title bar battery better resolution
Updated icon with VGA to match default skin
Updated Favorite Category setting to display all categories, not just in-use
Made iContact detect new skin/language installation
Restored ability to scroll down from bottom of list and up from top of list
